SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_MOVE_RECURRING_GIFT
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Sproc to reassign an orphaned recurring gift to the correct sponsorship.
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_MOVE_RECURRING_GIFT( @lookupId nvarchar(100), -- lookupid of the recurring gift which user enters into form @sponsorshipId uniqueidentifier -- id of the sponsorship which user is viewing ) as begin begin try declare @orphanRevenueSplitId uniqueidentifier; declare @orphanRevenueId uniqueidentifier; declare @activeRevenueSplitId uniqueidentifier; declare @activeRevenueId uniqueidentifier; declare @revenueConstituentId uniqueidentifier; declare @sponsorConstituentId uniqueidentifier; -- this will be passed into the sproc --declare @lookupId nvarchar(100) = 'rev-10210434' -- this will be passed into the sproc --declare @sponsorshipId uniqueidentifier = 'AB72529B-E26B-4CE6-8033-740A9412876A' declare @isOrphan bit = 0; declare @orphanTestId uniqueidentifier;
select @orphanRevenueId = rs.REVENUEID, @orphanRevenueSplitId = rs.ID, @revenueConstituentId = r.CONSTITUENTID from dbo.REVENUE r join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.REVENUEID = r.ID where r.LOOKUPID = @lookupId --order by rs.REVENUEID
-- make sure this is an orphan revenuesplitID select @orphanTestId = r.ID from dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs join dbo.REVENUE r on rs.REVENUEID = r.id left join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID where (r.ID = @orphanRevenueId and ((s.ID is null) OR (s.ID is not null and s.ID <> @sponsorshipId)))
if @orphanTestId is not null begin -- make sure this gift is related to this sponsor select @sponsorConstituentId = CONSTITUENTID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where ID = @sponsorshipId
if @sponsorConstituentId = @revenueConstituentId begin -- gift is associated with the correct sponsor, -- so find the gift that's getting replaced with the orphaned one select @activeRevenueId = rs.REVENUEID, @activeRevenueSplitId = rs.ID from dbo.REVENUE r join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.REVENUEID = r.ID join dbo.sponsorship s on s.revenuesplitid = rs.ID and s.ID = @sponsorshipId;
-- now update the sponsorship's revenuesplitid with the orphan revenue split id update dbo.sponsorship set REVENUESPLITID = @orphanRevenueSplitId where ID = @sponsorshipId and REVENUESPLITID = @activeRevenueSplitId end else begin RAISERROR 1000000 'This recurring gift is in use with another sponsorship!' end end else begin RAISERROR 1000000 'Unable to locate recurring gift, or it is not an orphan gift!' --print 'Not an orphan'; end end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
return 0; end
